me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.robot

Class AbstractEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.robot.AbstractEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encoder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractEncodedMotor, EmptyEncoder, SimulatedEncoder

    public abstract class AbstractEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Encoder
    An abstract implementation of the Encoder interface. In order to make use of this class, override the getRawTicks() method, which should return a raw tick reading from the encoder. You shouldn't modify this value yourself - you should use this class to apply any modifications you'd like to use to the encoder.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
